newsitem.title: BRAZIL: RESEARCH ALERT-Ericsson Brazil still a buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-Ericsson Brazil still a buy.

text.p: Banco Patrimonio/Salomon Brothers on Friday said it had reiterated its buy rating on Ericsson Telecomunicacoes SA, the Brazilian unit of Swedish telecommunications giant Telefon AB L.M. Ericsson.
-- The report followed the release of Ericsson's first-half earnings of 101 million reais, reflecting a 57 percent growth year-on-year.

-- "Currently, Ericsson's shares trade at 12 times our 1997 earnings estimates, which compares with 32.4 times for the average of other major telecom equipment companies in the world and 16.0 times for the Brazilian equity market," the report said.
-- Ericsson preferred was 5.65 percent lower at 58.50 reais in late afternoon trade on the Sao Paulo bolsa.
